body.name: WLIVE Dresser with 4 Drawers, Fabric Storage Tower, Organizer Unit for Bedroom, Hallway, Entryway, Closets, Sturdy Steel Frame, Wood Top, Easy Pull Handle, Rustic Brown Wood Grain Print
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 21 hrs 36 mins
features: MULTIFUNCTION DRESSER: This vertical closet dresser matches perfectly with other WLIVE storage towers; This storage dresser is great for closets, bedrooms, playrooms, entryways and more

SUFFICIENT STORAGE SPACE:WLIVE 4 dresser drawers are great for organizing your clothes, blankets, scarves, socks and other accessories; Wood top provides hard surface for displaying lamps, clocks, books, glasses etc.
STURDY STRUCTURE: Strong steel frame and water-resistant wood top offer stable support and ensure years of use; High-quality non-woven fabric drawers is easy to clean
4 Closet Drawers: Features 4 removable foldable drawers; Easy pull handle helps open and close the drawers simply; 4 adjustable plastic feet protect your floor from scratches
EASY ASSEMBLY: This chest of drawers is easy to assemble with hardware included; Overall dimension: 17.7" L*11.8" W*38.1" H
body.description: WLIVE Dresser with 4 Drawers A good helper to make your home tidy The exquisite design makes the fabric storage drawer unit great for closet, bedroom, nursery, playroom, entryway… Roomy drawer could store clothes, towels, daily groceries and other household items, keeping them organized Wood water-resistant surface provides a hard surface to place lamps, books, and décor Strong steel frame offers a stable support for removable fabric drawers Adjustable feet increase stability of the chest of drawers on uneven surfaces and can prevent the floor from scratches Overall dimension: 17.7"D x 11.8"W x 38.1"H Material: MDF+Steel Frame+Non-woven Fabric Static Load Capacity of the Table Top: 35 lbs Static Load Capacity of Each Drawer: 6.6 lbs Color Available: Dark Grey/ Light Grey/ Brown/ Rustic Brown/ Black

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best on the market!! Worth every penny
reviews.reviewText: I love this dresser!! It's easy to assemble, inexpensive, cute, and functional. I own 6 of these, from 3 different brands and this one is by far the best. The quality is superior to the others I own. It's sturdy and the drawers glide smoothly. My house is very old and getting heavy furniture in and out especially on the 2nd & 3rd floor is nearly impossible. So these things are a life saver. They are easy to move and hold a good amount of clothing. I also use them for storage to keep my rooms nice and tidy. I got it for $35 which is a steal and definitely worth the money. I just ordered 2 more of them... Lol

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for Small College Dorm Rooms!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the WLIVE Dresser with 4 Drawers, and I couldn't be happier with my purchase. If you're looking for a space-saving storage solution, especially for a dorm room or a small bedroom, this dresser is perfect.Multi-Function Dresser: This vertical closet dresser is incredibly versatile. It matches perfectly with other WLIVE storage towers, and I love that it can be used in various spaces, including closets, bedrooms, nurseries, playrooms, and entryways.Ample Storage Space: Despite its compact size, the four dresser drawers provide ample storage space. I've used them to organize my clothes, blankets, scarves, socks, and other accessories. The wood top is a fantastic addition, offering a sturdy surface for displaying items like lamps, clocks, books, and more.Sturdy and Durable: The dresser's strong steel frame and water-resistant wood top offer stable support. I'm confident that this piece of furniture will last for years to come. The high-quality non-woven fabric drawers are easy to clean, which is a bonus.Easy Assembly: Assembling this dresser was a breeze. The included hardware and clear instructions made the process quick and hassle-free. In no time, I had a functional and stylish storage solution.In summary, the WLIVE Dresser with 4 Drawers is a fantastic purchase. It's perfect for small spaces, easy to assemble, and incredibly sturdy. The quality and color options are impressive. I highly recommend this dresser to anyone in need of a compact and stylish storage solution. It's a definite 5-star product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good for value
reviews.reviewText: This product was very easy to put together I did it by myself in 20 mins at 5 months pregnant. The fabric drawers are a lot sturdier than I expected as well. It is the perfect size for what I purchased it for.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was very proud of myself being able to put this together. Lots of pieces, but clear instructions and fairly easy assembly, plus it is very sturdy! I have it placed inside my closet as storage for socks and underwear and it's perfect. It's also nice enough looking that you don't have to hide it in a closet =)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Easy to assemble and pretty sturdy for what it is. Put in my teen’s room. Will see how it holds up long term but it’s pretty cool right now.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Affordable and amazing quality prepare for a long time to assemble
reviews.reviewText: Took me a long time to put together. I have many different brands of these dressers.. this was the hardest one of them all to put together. But beautiful black on black. Pain to put together. When I move it will be difficult to disassemble. But besides that they give you extra peices with every screw, and bar. I love that they did that. Highly recommend this is one of the cheapest ones I could find and it's outstanding quality and durable. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks like the picture
reviews.reviewText: I love this. I got 2 to replace a fabric cubby unit I was using which was awful. It has a metal frame so drawers slide easily even though they are fabric, not sure how durable but I have room to spare so nothing is over crowded

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Smelly. East assembly. Looks nice.
reviews.reviewText: Well it was easy enough to put together and it looks nice. The exact sturdiness I expected from a metal frame and fabric drawers. Was not expecting the smell. Won’t be able to use it for clothing until I can get rid of the strange odor so it’s just taking up space for now. Wouldn’t recommend for anything other than baby clothes or undergarments due to weight capacity, but don’t want my baby’s clothes or undergarments absorbing the smell. Suppose I’ll be using it to store baking soda, dryer sheets, febreeze, and old newspaper for a while.
